attributes.action: Make it a criminal offence for any taxpayer funded employee to use new Press Charter rules to hide criminal activity in public office.
attributes.additional_details: Without the Daily Telegraph taxpayers would NEVER have found out about the level of fraud perpetrated on them by politicians.  Even today, Mr Speaker STILL uses taxpayer pounds to pay lawyers to stop politicians expenses information being made available to taxpayers!  Politicians the world over are THE most corrupt people and now the Press are under the control of two thirds of the fraudster membership of the House of Lords and the even more fraudster members of the House of Commons, just who is it that represents the interests of taxpayers against the congenital thieves and fraudsters amongst our electeds and patronage appointees who look upon theft and fraud of taxpayer pounds as a right?
